net.bubbaland.trivia

Interface TriviaInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TriviaServer

    public interface TriviaInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The interface for the trivia server. TriviaInterface provides the method API for calls to the trivia server.
    Author:
    Walter Kolczynski
